thread.title: View from the Valleys: Mature students make up third of students | Wales
thread.title_full: View from the Valleys: Mature students make up third of students | Wales - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: View from the Valleys: Mature students make up third of students | Wales
text:
Sian Jones is studying marketing, business and law Credit: ITV Wales More than a third of people from the Valleys studying for their first full time degree, are mature students.
Students at the University of South Wales Credit: ITV Wales Figures released to ITV Wales from the Higher Education Statistics Agency (HESA) show that in 2015/16, 3,325 students were over 21, compared to 5,910 under 21.
Sian Jones Credit: ITV Wales Sian Jones from Pontllanfraith in the Rhymney Valley, started her degree in her 30s.
Watch Sian's story:
